ai-tha-ap507:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap507:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap507:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap507:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap507:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
ai-tha-ap507:7.1_0: In the fifth of the senior ones, the fifth with fruit of the senior monks.
